keywords_explanation_array: "A vascular tissue of plant which conducts water from roots to stem.","A vascular tissue which transports sugars and other metabolic products from leaves to other parts of plants.","A long, water conducting cell which transports water from roots to other parts of plant.","A long, water conducting cell which dies when mature leaving lignified walls behind.","The series of end to end joined cells, through which conduction of food materials takes place.","A special parenchyma cell closely associated with the function of sieve tubes.","It is a meristem tissue where cells are present which are responsible for growth of plants."
animation_css: .contentHolder .contentDescription .explanationDiv .heading .bulletImage{float: left;      display: block;margin-top: 1.2%;      background: #F16101;      height: 10px;border: 1px solid #FFF;}
